skill_e.tooltip: After a 0.5 second delay, Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, forming a pentagon of walls. Enemies who attempt to pass through the perimeter are stopped and stunned for 1.5/1.75/2/2.25/2.5 seconds.

skill_i.tooltip: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.

skill_q.tooltip:
Unleashes a bolt of dark energy, dealing 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.6) magic damage to the first two enemies hit.

Killing a unit with this also grants Veigar a stack of Phenomenal Evil. Large minions and large monsters grant two.

skill_r.tooltip:
Blasts the target enemy champion with primal magic to deal 175/250/325 (+0.75) to 350/500/650 (+1.5) magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.

Damage is maximized against enemies below 33% health.

skill_w.tooltip:
After 1.2 seconds, dark matter falls from the sky to the target location, dealing 100/150/200/250/300 (+1) magic damage.

Every 50 stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown by 10% (currently ?%).
